spec_data.Name: perl-YUM-RepoQuery
spec_data.Description:
YUM::RepoQuery takes the URI to a package repository with YUM meta-data, and
allows one to query what packages, and versions of those packages, are
available in that repository.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:44:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Query a YUM repository for package information
